name: John Waves and his incredible adventure
name_original: John Waves and his incredible adventure
description:
John Waves and his incredible adventure is a western beat ‘em up game starring the magnificent John Waves as the main character. John Waves is a cowboy surrounded by enemies of every kind. His only defense and offense tool is his head, connected to his body with a wavy stretching neck inspired by Modigliani’s painting stile. Using arrows buttons to move and the shift button to charge and release his deadly head, John Waves must survive waves of angry natives and bandits. Don’t break his neck!

Credits: 

Software Designers: Marco Bianchi, Gianmaria Mancosu, Stefano Ledda

Graphic Designers: Giovanni Meloni, Stefano Ledda, Matteo Frau

Narrative Designer: Matteo Frau

Music Designer: cured by Stefano Ledda, from freesound.org
